text: Charles Weaver may refer to: *Charles A. Weaver (1845–1906), U.S. businessman *Charles P. Weaver (1851–1932), U.S. politician *Charles Weaver (Australian politician) (1817–1874), New South Wales politician *Charlie Weaver (politician) (born 1957), Minnesota politician *Charles Yardley Weaver (1884–1930), Alberta politician *Charlie Weaver (born 1949), American football player *for the actor who played Charley Weaver, see Cliff Arquette *Charles F. Weaver (died 1932), mayor of Ashland, Kentucky
title: Charles Weaver
